data.title: About the City
data.meta_description: Being the county seat, Sinton is located at the center of San Patricio County and is referred to as the "Gateway to the Gulf Coast."
data.text:
An Ideal Location

Sinton Texas combines the beauty of nature and the simplicity of country life along with the most popular city attractions. It is known as the Antique Capital of South Texas "Locally", Sinton offers a stroll down the main street with unique shops specialized in Antiques and Collectibles.

Now you can take a trip to the past and remember those days while viewing collections each shop has to offer. Trails for Birding, Fresh and saltwater fishing, golfing, shopping are just a few of the many unique and special opportunities Sinton offers for any visitor.

On the map we are located just 28 miles north of Corpus Christi, we are a three hour drive south from Houston, two hours south from San Antonio and two and a half hours North from popular Mexico border towns.

Being the county seat, Sinton is located at the center of San Patricio County and is referred to as the "Gateway to the Gulf Coast" Sinton is just 28 miles northwest of Corpus Christi, 195 miles southwest of Houston, 128 miles south of San Antonio and 175 miles north of Brownsville.

Request Information

Use our online form to contact the City of Sinton.
